attributes.title: He stinks
attributes.review: Donald Trump stinks a lot. I don’t like the way he smells. It might be the white supremacy? Bigotry? Oh, maybe the homophobia! Or transphobia? Or sexism? Maybe his xenophobia? I can’t tell.

attributes.title: Delete this app
attributes.review: This is more dangerous then Tik Tok because Trump is actually creating the violence not Tik Tok so you should delete the app👍🏻

attributes.title: bad
attributes.review: the worst app ever! it crashed so many times. and the sometimes when i wanted to open the app it wouldn’t let me. and if it did it would only show a white screen. nothing else. worst thing ever!
